FERR.BA.long_name: Ferrum Sociedad Anonima de Ceramica y Metalurgia
FERR.BA.summary: Ferrum Sociedad Anonima de Ceramica y Metalurgia offers sanitary ware products. It offers tapas and seats, public spaces, laundry products, sinks and lavatories, bathroom accessories, vanitories, bathtubs, screens, receptacles, cabins, and spare parts. The company is based in Avellaneda, Argentina.
